name: webpack-composer
description: A tool to quickly build and compose Webpack configurations.

webpackcomposer.rootDirectory.description:
The root directory of your project.  This should be a relative path that houses your package.json and webpack.config.js and will be used as the relative base-path for all other settings.

Note: You typically only want to set this in workspace settings.

webpackcomposer.targetDirectory.description: The directory that will house all supplemental configurations and helper methods for your Webpack tooling.
